General.Name: Jiangxi Everbright Measurement Cont
General.Description: Jiangxi Everbright Measurement And Control Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of track safety measurement and control equipment. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Nanchang, China. Jiangxi Everbright Measurement And Control Technology Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiangxi Everbright Industry Co., Ltd.
